rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
机器学习识别软组织肉瘤中的关键细胞群落利用斯坦福大学医学院开发的新型机器学习工具，研究人员绘制了三种不同的细胞结构，这些结构与患有罕见且难以治疗的软组织肉瘤的患者的临床结果相对应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Machine-learning-identizes-key-cellular-communities-in-soft-tissue-sarcoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Machine-learning-identizes-key-cellular-communities-in-soft-tissue-sarcoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf898cf5-4a12-4f0a-a56d-b533939b10a8 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 22:17:23 -0400 Machine learning identifies key cellular communities in soft tissue sarcoma
隐藏的大脑变化在患有一系列心脏病的人中很常见一项涉及超过 13,000 人的新分析发现，大脑血管的变化会增加中风和痴呆的风险，这种变化在患有一系列心脏病的人中很常见，无论他们是否经历过中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Hidden-brain-changes-found-to-common-in-people-with-a-range-of-heart-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Hidden-brain-changes-found-to-common-in-people-with-a-range-of-heart-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb8d3fef-90d5-4311-8995-0662e09bd721 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 21:25:07 -0400 Hidden brain changes found to common in people with a range of heart conditions
哥伦比亚大学研究人员获得价值 3895 万美元的 ARPA-H 合同，用于建造活体膝关节置换术哥伦比亚大学欧文医学中心和哥伦比亚工程学院的一组研究人员获得了健康高级研究计划局 (ARPA-H) 颁发的价值 3895 万美元的合同，用生物材料和人类干细胞建造活体膝关节置换物，其中包括患者自身的细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Columbia-researchers-secure-243895-million-ARPA-H-contract-to-build-a-living-knee-replacement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Columbia-researchers-secure-243895-million-ARPA-H-contract-to-build-a-living-knee-replacement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97580dd6-2b5b-4213-ac57-e654d0f55825 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 21:15:22 -0400 Columbia researchers secure $38.95 million ARPA-H contract to build a living knee replacement
新的遗传系统分析基于 CRISPR 的 DNA 修复结果的潜在机制自十多年前取得突破性发展以来，CRISPR 已经彻底改变了广泛领域的 DNA 编辑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/New-genic-system-analyzes-the-underlying-mechanisms-of-CRISPR-based-DNA-repair-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/New-genic-system-analyzes-the-underlying-mechanisms-of-CRISPR-based-DNA-repair-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ef70b51-8b51-4af3-beb6-23a08a5db3ae Tue, 26 Mar 2024 21:10:33 -0400 New genetic system analyzes the underlying mechanisms of CRISPR-based DNA repair outcomes
富含抗氧化剂的饮食可降低 2 型糖尿病风险，补充剂效果较差研究系统地回顾了膳食抗氧化剂、维生素 C、E 和 β-胡萝卜素对降低 2 型糖尿病风险的影响，表明与该疾病呈负相关，尽管没有观察到补充的保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Antioxidant-rich-diets-linked-to-lower-type-2-diabetes-risk-supplements-less- effective.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Antioxidant-rich-diets-linked-to-lower-type-2-diabetes-risk-supplements-less- effective.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b89f7cc0-8773-4bc5-a483-078411c2b3f4 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 19:51:00 -0400 Antioxidant-rich diets linked to lower type 2 diabetes risk, supplements less effective
ABT199/venetoclax 与塞替派的协同作用增强化疗药物对 AML 细胞的细胞毒性2024 年 3 月 14 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“ABT199/venetoclax synergism with thiotepa增强了fludarabine、cladribine和busulfan在AML细胞中的细胞毒性”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/ABT199venetoclax-synergism-with-thiotepa-enhances-cyto毒力-of-chemo-drugs-in-AML-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/ABT199venetoclax-synergism-with-thiotepa-enhances-cyto毒力-of-chemo-drugs-in-AML-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e28847bd-f4a6-4505-b8d6-2ea605c20b7d Tue, 26 Mar 2024 15:49:28 -0400 ABT199/venetoclax synergism with thiotepa enhances cytotoxicity of chemo drugs in AML cells
食管癌手术：标准切口和锁孔切口显示相似的结果新研究发现，在比较治疗食管癌（食道癌）的标准手术切口和锁孔手术切口时，没有发现恢复时间和并发症之间存在差异的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Esophageal-cancer-surgery-Standard-and-keyhole-incisions-show-similar-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Esophageal-cancer-surgery-Standard-and-keyhole-incisions-show-similar-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a946adb7-d5e5-4f31-b406-1bc4f70ca911 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 15:41:03 -0400 Esophageal cancer surgery: Standard and keyhole incisions show similar outcomes
新型无电池植入物允许用户实时监测膀胱充盈度你现在应该跑去洗手间吗？或者你能坚持到回家吗？新的植入物和相关的智能手机应用程序有一天可能会消除方程式中的猜测工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/New-battery-free-implant-allows-users-to-monitor-their-bladder-fullness-in-real-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/New-battery-free-implant-allows-users-to-monitor-their-bladder-fullness-in-real-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=269f7a5b-49a2-4495-af6a-1c567760b72c Tue, 26 Mar 2024 15:26:01 -0400 New battery-free implant allows users to monitor their bladder fullness in real time
研究确定了为年轻人建设心理健康友好型城市的关键优先事项随着世界各地的城市不断吸引年轻人从事工作、教育和社交机会，一项新的研究确定了支持年轻城市居民心理健康的特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-identizes-key-priorities-for-building-mental-health-friend-cities-for-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-identizes-key-priorities-for-building-mental-health-friend-cities-for-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad0a7984-d480-45ec-9576-8900fff3cffd Tue, 26 Mar 2024 15:11:24 -0400 Study identifies key priorities for building mental health-friendly cities for young people
机器学习识别创伤患者从氨甲环酸治疗中受益大阪大学的研究人员利用机器学习来识别在接受氨甲环酸治疗后更有可能幸存的创伤性损伤患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Machine-learning-identizes-trauma-病人-benefiting-from-tranexamic-acid-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Machine-learning-identizes-trauma-病人-benefiting-from-tranexamic-acid-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54dcbbf8-2239-4057-a7bd-3f9efd38e1be Tue, 26 Mar 2024 15:03:00 -0400 Machine learning identifies trauma patients benefiting from tranexamic acid treatment
